English: Happy birthday, Lady Aisha!
Your beauty shines brighter every day! I'm afraid my present may look dull compared to your beauty.
Also, look at this gorgeous garden! This place is perfect for hosting parties.
What a place befitting the esteemed lady of the Daphnel Family.
Thank you, everyone. You are all too kind with your compliments. And thank you all for making the time to visit my party.
May I have the honor of dancing with you, Lady Aisha?
I thank you for the offer, but I have other guests to attend to.
Then may I accompany you for a walk over there?
I really have to attend to other guests. I’m afraid I have to refuse.
But thank you for your kind offer.
There really is no end to this... This is why I told my father that I don’t need a birthday party.
If only my father didn’t insist so much on hosting it...
Oh, Prisci-
Oh, there you are! Happy birthday, Lady Aisha!
Th-thank you. It's been a while.
Were you surprised? Please forgive me, I was just too excited to see you.
It’s alright. How have you been?
Ugh, I didn't get to hear happy birthday from the one I really wanted to hear it from...
It's my birthday, for crying out loud.
You look drained. I don't blame you, there are so many people here.
I'm fine, thank you. Everyone is here to congratulate my birthday, after all.
I should greet them as best as I can.
I wanted to have a quiet birthday this year...
Oh well, what can I do... This is my duty.
She must be nervous, yet she greets them with poise.
Expected of the esteemed lady of a reputable noble family.
Excuse me! I need some help here!
Right away!
By the way, Priscilla, did you say happy birthday to Lady Aisha?
Not yet, no. The lady is busy, and I too have-
I see... I guess it can't be helped. I’m sure her ladyship will understand.
I hope she does...
It's no use... It's not like I can push aside the guests and speak to her.
I do have a gift for her, but... I’m not sure if I can give it to her by today.
Priscilla! Over here, please!
I’m going!
It’s already late at night...
I didn't know that it was this hard to host and maintain a party like this...
Ugh! Seriously! When will this darn party end?!
I wonder if Lady Aisha is okay... She looks exhausted...
I had so much fun today. Please come to the party held at my mansion next time!
Thank you. Please take care.
It’s finally over... I’m so exhausted... I can finally rest now...
I wonder what time it is now. 30 minutes to midnight?
Wait, it's this late already?!
You must be exhausted. Let’s clean up tomorrow morning. We should go to bed now.
It’s quite late and tomorrow is about to start...
That sounds like a good--wait, what time is it now?!
10 minutes until midnight...
L-lady Aisha! I need to speak to you!
Priscilla! So good to see you! I-
Forgive me, but please come to my side.
Huh?
You must be really tired, but please...
I really need to tell you this now.
It’s okay. How about you Priscilla? Aren't you exhausted?
I’m alright, my lady. Now...
Happy birthday, Lady Aisha. Although this isn't anything big,
I really wanted to give this to you by today.
Anything is fine as long as it’s from you, Priscilla!
This is the best gift I've received today. Thank you so much!
Na-na-na! Lalala!
Wow, May looks really happy.
Well, her birthday is coming up soon... She’s going to get more and more cheerful.
What should I get her this year?
Luna! Luna has something she wants to do!
Luna wants to give a ‘surprise gift’ to May!
A ‘surprise gift?’
Yes! So, it's...
Ooh, this is cute. How much is this?
Hmm... I should wait and buy it for my birthday later!
Firework Workshop? Wow, this looks interesting... and fun.
But unfortunately, I don't have the time right now...
Ooh! Oh wow, I really want this one!
Let's see how much I have... Oh no, maybe next time.
What is it?
Hey Luna! Ah, I was just talking about this one.
Hmm? You want that one? Should I sell my carrots?
Eh, I don’t think you can get enough money by selling carrots...
Aww...
It’s okay. I can cut some expenses here and there to gather extra cash.
But then again, it is my birthday... Maybe I should just take some money from my savings--
Huh?
Ah, never mind! Where are you off to, Luna?
Luna was going to the forest to hang out! Wanna come, May?
I'll pass. I have to go back to the store... Let’s play together next time.
Okay! I will see you next time then! Bye-bye!
D-Day
Wow, what a beautiful day.
So glad the weather is great today!
Good day! Here’s a letter for you!
A letter?
It doesn't have a name on it. I wonder who sent it.
Huh? An invitation?
Wow, wow, wow!! Its an invitation to the Firework Workshop!
I was going to go sign up for this today!
...I really wonder who sent me this.
Na-na-na! Lalala!
It was around here... Let’s see.
Congratulations! This is our gift to the
one who made the biggest and coolest firework!
Huh?
I've never heard of an event like that before.
Eh, whatever. I guess it started today.
Yay! Thank you!
Now, Juno said she will make dinner. I should-
Hmm? A parcel this time?
Let’s see... It says, ‘Thank you every day!’
I wonder who sent this... I might know who it is.. Or maybe not..
Let’s see what's inside... Whoa!!
Huh...
Huhhh?!?!?!
Welcome, May! Happy birthday!
Happy birthday, May! I’ve brought you some carrots!
Thank you, Juno! You are here too, Luna! Thank you!
Hey, May, did you have a good time today?
Oh yes! I had a perfect time!
I see! You had a good day! That’s good!
Hehehe, another lovely day!
Now I’m gonna have a quick breakfast, and open the store.
Oh, right! And I have to pray to Goddess Lua. May she grant me fortune today!
It’s my birthday today, so business will boom today!
Welcome! Welcome!
Welcome to Requina’s General Store! Today is the medicinal ingredient day!
All kinds of medicinal ingredients are on sale today. Pick one, take one!
They are all super effective! I only sell ingredients that were proven effective through clinical trials!
...How much for those mushrooms?
20,000 Gold per pack!
That product is on a bonus deal. It's buy one get one free!
It’s good for coughs and runny noses when it's boiled.
But don't crush it. If you use it in its powder form, it can cause breathing difficulty and paralysis. Please take caution when using it.
...Note taken. I'll be careful.
How much is this grass?
Oh, that’s 5,000 Gold per pack!
Apply in onto a scar after boiling and grinding. It will stop the bleeding!
But, if you don’t boil it,
it will harden the blood in other areas as well, so be careful!
Hello, Requina.
You have so many customers today.
Oh, hello, Mediana!
Ah, my VIP customer has arrived. What kind of research brought you here today?
Ahaha, actually, I’m not here for research.
Here, a present for you.
Wow, you remembered my birthday?
Thank you!
Ooh! Hmm. This drug has such a pretty color.
Fufufu, Yanne caught me a rare Muhroom not too long ago. I ground it and made it into a... medication.
In the right dose, it becomes an excellent tranquilizer. It’s great for self-defense.
Too much, however, can cause symptoms of hallucination. So please use it carefully.
Hehehe, thank you.
I’m sure I will have uses for it.
And since I’m here, can I order some poisonous mushrooms and poisonous plants?
In a large quantity. You know where to deliver it... right?
Hehehe... Of course, my dear customer.
See you then!
*Yawn...* A prayer to the goddess on my birthday always works.
Business is good, my mood is good... I don’t want to go to bed to end the day just yet though...
Now would've been the perfect time to test poison! Too bad there are no patients today.
This is the end for you, Merchant of Death.
Huh?
You dare to sell poison to our rival?
Our day was ruined because of you!
What? I don't even-
Shut up!!
Wait, that’s!!
This must be one of your precious poisons.
I will kill you with your own invention!!!
What the... Th-this smell...
Hehehe... Thank you for inhaling the poison yourself...
I can easily get rid of you now! Hehe!
Ahhh! Wh-what is this?! H-how did you multiply?!
D-don’t tell me y-you sold poison to--
You catch on so slowly! What a fool!
I can't let you escape alive now...
I will kill you slowly... and painfully with my poison.
Ahhhh!! Somebody help!!!
Help... Hel...
*Sigh* I can't believe he actually touched Mediana’s drug.
That drug is really something though. Mediana really is an expert.
Oh! Good!
I can use this person to test my poison!
Don’t worry, though. I don't kill people with poison... Tee hee.
We will do great things together, you and I. Hohoho!
I really am lucky on my birthday!
Excellent job today, Reina.
Hehe, this is nothing!
Fufu. You are always so cheerful and bright, Reina. It's nice.
Here is your payment for this task.
And this is my present to you.
Huh? A present?
This looks so expensive... Are you sure I can have this?
Fufu, you are my valuable customer, after all.
I can't just ignore the birthday of someone so precious.
H-how did you know today was my birthday in the first place?
Well, actually, you are the most famous information dealer in all of the Empire, after all, hehe.
Thank you for your present! I will put it to good use!
Actually, I wanted to buy you a beautiful accessory...
Then I realized that you already had one. That’s why I prepared something else.
Oh, this?
Hehe, this is also a birthday gift from someone.
To be exact, I kinda...sorta forced it from him.
Oh, do I hear an interesting story?
Well... it’s a long story...
(Wait, hang on...)
Stop!!
Ugh, where did he go?!
Just you wait and see! I’m not going to let you run away!
Mister!
Strange mister!!
Did you fly up in the air?
Or did you dig a hole underground and hide inside?
What a dilemma.
I can’t just leave her like that... What should I do?
*Huff, huff* found you... Strange mister!!
I’m not going to let you run away now!
Sign a contract with me! Let’s work together!!
You still have that much energy left? What an energetic young lady you are.
But like I said before, I have something very important I must do.
I can’t sign a contract, let alone work with you.
Aw... But I need that portal you use...
It takes too much effort running around. It's also very tiring...
But you were running around really enthusiastically just now.
That’s because I had to keep up with you...
Hmm...
You really are fast, young lady. You are probably the fastest person I’ve ever seen.
But I think you already know that.
Why do you seek my ability?
Mm?
....To run away...
....Run away?
When someone gives me a contract that I don't want to do... I just want to run away from it.
There are so many people who look down on me because I’m young and inexperienced.
They look down on me! They just hand me contracts without asking me!
...I see...
Yes, I wish people realize what I'm capable of!
But it's no use if I only get strange contracts! I hate it!
I just want to... run away from people like that...
(Now that I've heard her story... I can't just send her away like this... What should I do?)
(Ah, there was that.)
...Like I said before, I can't go with you.
However, I can give you this.
What is this?
This will make you really fast.
With this, you may be able to move as fast as light.
Perhaps you may outspeed me even.
That’s awesome!!!
One should not run away from his or her duty and responsibility.
That is...if you are an adult.
You are still young to embrace all that.
Mister...
One day, when you become a real adult,
the time will come when you have to do something whether you like it or not.
Use this well until that time comes.
This is between you and me. You've never heard or saw me, okay?
...Okay!
Thank you so much, mister!!
(Oh yeah... He asked me to keep this a secret...)
Reina?
I’m sooooo curious about the story. Will you please tell me?
Oh, ahahaha... Sorry! It’s been too long and I forgot what was behind this.
Until next time then! Keep in touch!!
Aww, I really wanted to hear the full story...
Then again, I will let this pass as today is your birthday, Reina. fufufu.
I WILL hear it next time though... Fufufu!!
So many customers these days... It’s getting a little too hectic now. Not to mention that the inn is running low on ingredients too...
Hey, Juno.
Oh, hey Kirze. I feel like you're becoming a regular now.
As for the meal... The usual, I presume?
Yes... Please.
Hehe, thank you for always enjoying my meal.
Don't mention it. Your meals are all delicious.
Hmm, I noticed that there are a lot of people researching cooking nowadays.
Apparently, the current trend is monster food...
How about you, Juno? If you are interested in monster food, then-
Oh... Um, haha... No thanks, I’m not really fond of monster food...
Actually, now that you are here, can I ask you a favor? Mind looking after the inn for me later?
Lately, there's been more customers than usual, so I need to get more ingredients.
Me? But I've never served customers before...
You’re gonna be fine. I’m going to place an absence sign on the door anyway. All you have to do is just look out for any suspicious people.
Hm... Well, if that's the case...
Great. I'll be back as soon as possible. Thank you again for doing this for me, Kirze.
Okay.
Meanwhile, at May’s General Store...
Hmm… today is Juno's birthday. What should I make for her?
Maybe.. something just ordinary?
No! This time, I will make her the best food ever!
And I have all these fresh ingredients with me! I’m sure Juno will love this dish!
Um... Yanne, we need to talk. Didn’t you see Juno’s face when she saw your monster food last time? I don't think she likes monster food.
Nonsense. Nothing is more nutritious than monster food.
I'm gonna give my all today! For poor Juno, who hasn't had a proper break for months!
(I have a bad feeling about this... again.)
Good. I should strike the iron while it's hot! I’m gonna go cook right now!
You're coming with me, May! Together, we're gonna make the best monster food for Juno!
Like I said-- Huhhh? W-wait up! Yanne! Yaaanne!
Juno... I’m here! Juno? Hmm?
Oh... Um... Juno asked me to look after the inn for a while...
Oh, good to see you. I’m Yanne. Juno and I are real close friends.
So, she asked you to look after the inn, huh... Where did she go?
She said she's going to get some ingredients. She told me there has been a lot of customers lately, so she needs more supplies...
Hmm...
You know, Juno’s been really busy lately.
So I want to make a dish for Juno that will give her the stamina boost she needs. Not to mention that today is also her birthday. Do you mind if I use the kitchen?
Birthday?
Yep. Today is Juno's birthday. I’m gonna use all the cooking skills I've learned to make her the best food ever.
You look like you are close with Juno too. Wanna join me?
But I’ve never cooked before...
That’s okay! I will give you all the instructions you need. Trust me.
If you say so...
Awesome. Now, let’s prepare the ingredients...
Hmm? Why are you making that face?
Um... Aren’t these all monster parts?
Yep, I specially handpicked them myself. Nothing beats monster food when it comes to energy boost.
But Juno told me that she doesn't like monster food...
Ah, my friend. You haven't heard about it either, eh? These are all full of nutrition and protein!
Also, I’m going to make this dish look like an ordinary meat dish. So there's no way she'll know.
...If you cooperate, that is.
Huh? I-uh...
You will cooperate, right?
Uh... That’s...
I know you will.
This is for Juno.
Ah... Ugh...
(*Sigh...* I knew this would happen...)
Phew! Sorry I took so long, Kirze! There were just too many things I had to- Oh, Yanne! You're here too?
Now, what is all this-
Happy birthday, Juno! I know you've been real busy.
That’s why we've prepared all these healthy food for you. We made all of this together.
Three of you... Together?
Well, uh... Thank you for making all these birthday dishes for me. You didn't put anything weird in them, right?
Like monster meat...?
Come on... I wouldn’t use ingredients you don't like.
Right, Kirze?
Huh? Um... Y-yeah...
Hm... Yeah, I shouldn’t doubt you girls. You made something special for me, after all.
Thank you all for this! Time for a feast!
Oh, right! What was I thinking? I have to meet someone really soon!
I really have to go! So sorry about this! I’m gonna head off now! See you all later!
That’s weird. I’ve never seen Yanne in such a hurry.
Hmm? Wait, this meat... I know this from somewhere...
(Yanne... You traitor!)
Father.
Me, came this far. So many things happened... So many trouble...
Demons... Many I kill. People... Many I protect.
Father... I good? I good chief? Like you said?
...She looks quite down today. Do you think she is homesick?
Probably so. A long-time has passed since she left home.
Being this far from home must’ve evoked the thought of home.
And not to mention, I happen to hear this awhile back, but...
Hm?
I heard today is Nia’s birthday.
What?! Of course you get depressed if you celebrate your birthday alone in a place so far from home!
Maybe I should make her something delicious to cheer her up and celebrate her birthday.
That sounds good. I can help you with that!
Hey, Nia.
Still feeling down, I see...
You are...
Father, great chief.
He told me, be great chief.
I see... And?
Am I... A great chief?
Hmm... What do you think makes a great chief?
Great chief... Protects many people. No matter what.
Also, great chief kills many Demons. Any Demon.
Especially strong Demons. Must kill them. Chief strongest. Chief always fight first.
But me... I’m not strong like father...
I can’t protect and kill like my father...
Am I... I don’t know... Would father think I a good chief?
Hmm... I don’t know what exactly your 'good' means,
but I think you are doing really well.
I’m sure your father would be proud of you.
Really?
Of course! Well... Um.. Yeah... So...
Uhh... Oh, right. Close your eyes and reach out your hand for a bit.
Huh? Okay.
Wha?
What is this?
A present for the chieftain who’s doing a great job.
And a birthday present! It is your birthday today, chief.
Yes... Present? I don’t have to give you money for this?
That’s right! It’s a gift!
Okay... Thank you...
You are not going to open it?
You should! You are going to like it.
M-meat! Smell is the best I have ever had!
Haha. I used my secret ingredient.
We made you a lot. Eat them all and cheer up.
Thank you! Meat! Yummy!
Yum! Very yummy!
Hey, Nia... We are not going to steal the food from you. So eat slow-
*Cough!*
Oh my, I knew that would happen.
Don't just stand there! Help!
Yes, my daughter. You were, and always will be my proud little daughter.\nYou already are a great chief.
But that’s not the important thing.\nAll I wish is that you live a happy life forever.
